column4: Does anybody know if US dial-up 56k modems work in Japan? I believe RJ11 is one of the standards in use in Japan although I don't know if that is the only thing you have to worry about.

does that mean every 56k modem should work worldwide as a general rule? I know I read there were some modems that didn't work in the US due to com ports only supporting up to like 8 and the US ISPs generally ran on 13. or something like that.
you'll have to see the telecomm specs in japan, and see if n.a ones are compatible..
